page.title: 16RATBY FAIR.
page.content: The Fair comes to Ratby once a year and is held on land near the Plough Inn.There are five rides (so it's not a big fair),they are the Cyclone,the Chaser,the Waltzer,the Little Trains and the Roundabout.All the rides cost 25p.There is also an arcade and some 'One Armed Bandits'.Of course there are some other games to play for prizes like the Shooting Gallery, Hook-a-Duck and the Ball in the Bucket. People enjoy going to the fair to meet friends,to go on the rides and to try the food.The atmosphere and noise are terrific and the latter can be heard from the other end of the village.The best time to go is at night because the lights and activity magically transform the fair and the rides become even more thrilling.The candy-floss is good too.
